titles.title: For the relief of certain aliens who were aboard the Golden Venture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.
Executive Comment Requested from Immigration and Customs Enforcement by the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote .

bill.summary: 3/8/2005--Introduced. Directs the Attorney General to adjust the status of 31 specified persons (who were aboard the Golden Venture) to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.
